messages.content: Is the floor lamp in the nook currently on and is it responding properly?

__BEGIN_NUCORE_PROPERTY_QUERY__
{
  "device_id": "4D 33 4D 3",
  "property_id": "ST",
  "property_name": "Status",
  "reasoning": "User wants to know if the floor lamp is on or off."
}
__END_NUCORE_PROPERTY_QUERY__
__BEGIN_NUCORE_PROPERTY_QUERY__
{
  "device_id": "4D 33 4D 3",
  "property_id": "ERR",
  "property_name": "Responding",
  "reasoning": "User also wants to confirm if the floor lamp is responding properly."
}
__END_NUCORE_PROPERTY_QUERY__
Can you tell me if the shades in the living room middle and the right side are opening or closing right now?

__BEGIN_NUCORE_PROPERTY_QUERY__
{
  "device_id": "n001_7a71a875acb",
  "property_id": "ST",
  "property_name": "Status",
  "reasoning": "User asked for the current status of the Living Room Shades Middle to check if they are opening or closing."
}
__END_NUCORE_PROPERTY_QUERY__
__BEGIN_NUCORE_PROPERTY_QUERY__
{
  "device_id": "n001_552c880e",
  "property_id": "ST",
  "property_name": "Status",
  "reasoning": "User asked for the current status of Shades Right to check if they are opening or closing."
}
__END_NUCORE_PROPERTY_QUERY__
What is the backlight level of the Nook floor lamp keypad button?
CLARIFY: Are you asking for the current backlight brightness level or do you want to change the backlight setting for the Nook floor lamp keypad button?
Are the living room shades middle and the right shades both closed?

__BEGIN_NUCORE_PROPERTY_QUERY__
{
  "device_id": "n001_7a71a875acb",
  "property_id": "ST",
  "property_name": "Status",
  "reasoning": "User wants to know if the Living Room Shades Middle are closed."
}
__END_NUCORE_PROPERTY_QUERY__
__BEGIN_NUCORE_PROPERTY_QUERY__
{
  "device_id": "n001_552c880e",
  "property_id": "ST",
  "property_name": "Status",
  "reasoning": "User wants to know if the Shades Right are closed."
}
__END_NUCORE_PROPERTY_QUERY__
